label: CO2 sequestration
Comment: VER that are available to be sold (equals sequestered carbon)
Source: Lit. (mainly "World potential of agroforestry systems", Ram et. al 2016), multiplied with C to CO2 factor 44/12

label: Additional shares sold
Comment: Number of additionally purchased company shares with strat. 1

label: Price of company shares
Comment: Satzung PuroVerde eG_Stand_Juli 2017 (mit Änderungen).pdf

label: Consultant cost (initial)
Comment: Total cost of consultant for initial certification

label: Consultant cost (perf.-cert.)
Comment: Total cost of consultant in performance review years. In normal years: no consultant needed

label: Discount rate
Comment: Discount rate

label: Exchange rate
Comment: Exchange rate to convert GS fees in USD to euro

label: GS fee (new area certification)
Comment: Fee to certify new area

label: GS fee (perf.-cert.)
Comment: Performance review fee, paid every 5 years

label: GS fee (preliminary review)
Comment: Preliminary Review for LUF Carbon, paid once,

label: GS fee (registry account)
Comment: Per year, per account

label: Working hours PVPF (initial)
Comment: Working hours of PuroVerde P.F. for initial certification

label: Working hours PVPF (perf.-cert.)
Comment: Working hours of Querdenker for years in which PerfCert is taking place

label: Working hours PVPF (non-perf.-cert.)
Comment: Working hours of PuroVerde P.F. for maintaining certification

label: Working hours QD (initial)
Comment: Working hours of Querdenker for initial certification

label: Working hours QD (perf.-cert.)
Comment: Working hours of Querdenker for years in which PerfCert is taking place

label: Working hours QD (non-perf.-cert.)
Comment: Working hours of Querdenker for maintaining certification

label: Initial size of area
Comment: Size of initial area of finca

label: Marketing costs
Comment: Marketing costs for strategy 1 (sale of CO2 neutral products)

label: Crediting period
Comment: Lifetime of project
Source: Afforestation/Reforestation GHG Emissions Reduction & Sequestration Methodology

label: Recurrence of perf.-cert.
Comment: How often does the PerfCert recure
Source: Afforestation/Reforestation GHG Emissions Reduction & Sequestration Methodology

label: Additional product sales
Comment: Additional income due to higher WTP for carbon neutral products; strategy 1: carbon neutral products

label: Salary of PVPF employees
Comment: Salary of PuroVerde P.F. employees

label: Salary of QD employees
Comment: Salary of Querdenker

Comment: Sales comission from BaumInvest to Querdenker
